title: A2159 Keyboard
message:
i have a macbook pro A2159 and it needs a keyboard

do you guys know if it uses the same keyboard as the other models

title: A2159 Keyboard
message:
As dukefawks mentioned, an Apple keyboard program is available for these machines.
If you didn't work on it yet, run to Apple.

He also said to forget about changing keyboard only:
"Keyboards are crap quality and you need to drill the rivets. It is NOT like the A1466 or A1502
But for the love of god just get a complete topcase"
